items.title: Ukrainian drones attack Moscow, Russia says, as Zelenskyy says Kyiv ready for deal
items.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said on Tuesday that he believes the U.S. "wants to reach a final agreement," to end the war in Ukraine.

items.title: WATCH:  Charity pleads for stolen toys for homeless children to be returned before Christmas
items.description: The toys were to be gifted to homeless and needy children in Long Island. Police are searching for the suspects.

items.title: WATCH:  Alabama football player brings Christmas joy to local children
items.description: Crimson Tide center Parker Brailsford used money from his (NIL) name, image and likeness deal to give 10 kids a brighter Christmas.
